events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and have not received any tracking updates. The package is significantly delayed, and I am worried it might be lost.
This case has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipment and missing tracking information.
The support case was assigned to the logistics specialist team to investigate the delivery status of the delayed order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your delayed shipment. I will be happy to assist you in resolving this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have received so far? This will help us look into the delay more effectively.
My order number is 123456789, but unfortunately, I have not received any tracking emails or updates since the purchase.
After checking with the shipping carrier, it appears there was an unexpected delay at the sorting facility. We will expedite the shipment and provide you with an updated tracking number today.
Thank you for the update and for speeding up the delivery process. I appreciate your quick response and attention to this matter.
We have now dispatched your package with expedited shipping, and the updated tracking number has been sent to your email. The delivery should arrive within the next two days.
We wanted to check in to ensure your order arrived successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided regarding the delivery delay.
As you have confirmed receipt of your package and had no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
